subject: Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Three cities made the cut yesterday as the International Olympic Committee trimmed the field for the 2014 Winter Olympics. Salzburg, Austria; Pyeongchang, South Korea; and Sochi, Russia were selected as finalists by the I.O.C.'s executive board.
snippet: Three cities made the cut yesterday as the International Olympic Committee trimmed the field for the 2014 Winter Olympics. Salzburg, Austria; Pyeongchang, South Korea; and Sochi, Russia were selected as finalists by the I.O.C.'s executive board.
